text:
Kindly understand that since you still won’t provide any assurance you won’t use this against me, I will work with Lisa.
Not at all being combative. I just can’t keep asking the question over and over, day after day, not get reassurance, but continue.
Thanks, Christine. Hope we have better luck on other things!
Message 1352 of 4024
I won’t. We are both navigating. This is not your fault and I appreciate you continuing to let me know. I got an alert a Samsung device connected last
night and I have no idea what that was. Frustrating.
Sent:02/13/2024 at 09:52 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:53 AM)
Subject:Re: Still getting alerts
Message 1353 of 4024
That is very thoughtful. Thank you for the effort and thinking of me. I really appreciate it. I’ll be on standby
Sent:02/13/2024 at 09:53 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:55 AM)
Subject:Re: Touch Base
Message 1354 of 4024
His arm is still funky. We had to leave ski early because of it. I would like him to rest it but can ask him tonight his thoughts if he attend practice.
When is AAU tryouts?
Heading into back to back so I’ll be dark for a bit.
Sent:02/13/2024 at 09:56 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:57 AM)
Subject:Adrian
Message 1355 of 4024
Thank you. That’s all I needed to hear.
You think that’s frustrating, imagine a blink alert popping and trying to figure out wtf that’s all about.
If you can tell me next time BEFORE you open it, I can help you open it and diagnose a bit more.
Happy to help any way I can. These things have pretty much ruined my life.
Sent:02/13/2024 at 09:57 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 10:07 AM)
Subject:Re: Still getting alerts
